title: Between the Scenes - Colin Kaepernick's Nike Ad & The Downside of Aligning with Brands
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Colin Kaepernick's Nike Ad & The Downside of Aligning with Brands
description:
While Trevor is a fan of Colin Kaepernick's Nike ad, he worries about the problematic nature of supporting corporate brands based on their political messaging.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
